data.eml:eml: Sindora stipitata (Detarioideae, Leguminosae), a new species from Thailand

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Promprom, Wilawan, Chatan, Wannachai, Saisaard, Peerapol (2018): Sindora stipitata (Detarioideae, Leguminosae), a new species from Thailand. PhytoKeys 100: 149-156, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.100.25870, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.100.25870
